title: Lightweight XPath2 implementation for .NET
description: This is an implementation of W3C XML Path Language (XPath) 2.0 for .NET Framework based on standard XPathNavigator API.
authors: Semyon A. Chertkov and Stef Heyenrath
copyright: Semyon A. Chertkov and Stef Heyenrath

packOptions.summary: This is an implementation of W3C XML Path Language (XPath) 2.0 for .NET Framework based on standard XPathNavigator API. The given implementation based on practice of developing XQuery is fully corresponding to the specification demands.
